chart_description: This chart shows the number of HTTP requests made by the kubelet to the Kubernetes API server, separated by request method (POST and PUT). The chart provides insight into the frequency and distribution of requests made by the kubelet, which helps to monitor the activity of this critical component of the Kubernetes infrastructure.

dimension_descriptions.POST: The number of HTTP requests made by the kubelet to the Kubernetes API server using the POST method.
dimension_descriptions.PUT: The number of HTTP requests made by the kubelet to the Kubernetes API server using the PUT method.
